data.text: @APyxel @TRyanGregory We all had to adapt our lives to the pandemic but we never lost time! Plenty found new things to do. And you got plenty of time to find love. I found my soulmate at 27.
@TRyanGregory @DrBarbKing I think you are missing the part where we said “f* it, let’s just stop testing and the numbers will go down”

@APyxel @Connardanonyme1 @TRyanGregory Like any other sick or injured person, people infected with Covid are only admitted to hospital when they need critical care. Vaccinated people can still die from Covid. Letting the disease run rampant will overrun our hospitals. Preventative measures are needed.
@_scornful_one @Connardanonyme1 @TRyanGregory And all Motorcyclists that have to be admitted to the hospital (not emergency) have life-threating injuries.

@_scornful_one @Connardanonyme1 @TRyanGregory I specifically said "Unvaccinated" and I clarified that those in critical condition should be prioritized in our health system. As far as I know, almost all smokers who are in hospital have cancer. Contact sports have protective equipment and most have a broken bone.
@APyxel @Connardanonyme1 @TRyanGregory Do you also think we should provide separate health facilities for people who smoke, play contact sports, or drive motorcycles?
@_scornful_one @Connardanonyme1 @TRyanGregory Why do covid patients go to civillian hospitals? In my opinion, unvaccinated covid patients should be at be lower in triage then other critical people.
@APyxel @_scornful_one @TRyanGregory I got blocked by this @_scornful_one. Because I was never rude or anything, I assume he just ran out of arguments. Pathetic.

@APyxel @Connardanonyme1 @TRyanGregory You say that, but you would probably be upset if someone close to you was critically ill and couldn't get admitted to hospital because they are overwhelmed with Covid patients.
